website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable behind-the-head earmuffs that don't pull or press on the ears.
pros: These foldable earmuffs are more durable than most competitors and keep your ears covered and warm
If you wear glasses or use earbuds, these will still cover your ears comfortably
cons: Is a bit bulky in the closed position when carrying in a pocket

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this version - See image
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same order last year 2015 and this new 2016 version is not what I expected. The ear warmer is thinner and smaller in comparison to the old one. I would rate the 2015 version a 5 star. The ear warmer kept my ears nice and warm at 20 degrees, Michigan weather. I have no doubt this would keep it warm below 0. I'm an avid cyclist/runner and I would have to take it off sometimes to cool my ears down. I will change the rating when they fix this latest issue. See images for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap knockoff of original 180s and not the item pictured
customer_reviews.text: I owned an earlier version of 180s and loved them. I ordered this pair and noticed it was less warm, smaller, and used worse fleece. I didn't think too much of it, but then it broke within a week when the platic pieces inside disconnected. I can't return it since it's broken, so I'm writing my first review just to warn others away. Amazon should be ashamed for perpetuating this as this is a fundamentally different product than the one that received 1500 largely positive reviews. This one is crap and the product page is deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really do fit people with abnormally large heads!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who has a big head (He says that it's to house all of the brains he has. I don't agree....). Nothing ever fits him! I dutifully looked through the answered questions to see if anyone else had the same problem and they did! The vendor responded that "Unless you have a head the size of a pinata, these will fit". I actually laughed out loud and added them to my card right then. Guess what - they did fit and his head is only slightly smaller than a pinata! I don't have to hear him whine about cold ears anymore! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhinestone Mom

customer_reviews.title: $20 piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: Nice disposable earmuffs. Keeps your head warm while it works. It lasts about 2 months. Mine suddenly broke one cold winter day when I took it out of storage. The elastic band somehow got twisted so when I tried to unfold the pair, the right ear snapped. Now it's sitting in the dumpster waiting for Monday pickup. 1 star is quite a generous review from me.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Liu

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as 180s
customer_reviews.text: The first delivery of this product was broken, but I got a quick replacement. This was last March and they never fit quite right - they wouod move when I turned my head and I'd have to readjust. Yesterday when I put them on the right side piece snapped off inside and no longer stays against my ear. I ordered genuine 180s which are coming Friday and I made sure they were actual 180s not Degrees by 180s. Hopefully the ones coming will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement pair for my originals that I've had for many years. I finally broke them and couldn't survive winter without a new pair. I'm not sure they are exactly the same brand but the old one's said "180" so I think so. I would caution women to check your earrings when you take these off; I just recently lost one of my favorites because I just ripped them off without remembering I had earrings on and noticed much too late that one was missing!! Totally my fault for not paying attention. But these are so nice because not only comfortable and not too noticeable but don't mess your hair up!! Definitely recommend them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie K

customer_reviews.title: During the winter I like to wear my wool felt ivy cap
customer_reviews.text: The warmest way to keep your ears warm. During the winter I like to wear my wool felt ivy cap, but it leaves my ears out in the cold. I don't care too much pulling a wool knit cap down on my head, and wrapping a scarf around my ears would look silly. And this is where the behind-the-head earmuffs really come into their element. These earmuffs kept my ears very toasting, even when I traveled to Berlin, Germany, during one of their coldest winters. My brother-in-law tried them on and immediately fell in love with them, so I had the pleasure of buying him a pair also. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Love

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Warm!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a repeat from several years ago. Living in a river town and owning a dog, I'm outside walking regardless of the weather or time of day. Past experience with these ear warmers has been perfect in keeping cold windy conditions bearable. The only reason for this purchase is that my 3 year old warmers are starting to show a little wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shellseeker

customer_reviews.title: These do a great job
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, I don't like wearing hats, never did. But my ears get terrible cold in the winter. These ear muffs do a great job keeping them warm without mussing up your hair. Women take note! The trick is though, make sure you put them on before your ears a subjected to the cold. Nothing helps once your ears are cold, not even a hat. But these will keep the warmth in. I got them for my forklift drivers as Christmas presents, they loved them. K.F.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: smaller than other 180 models
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying 180s for year and love them. But these are smaller than any I have purchased before, and edges are narrower. Edge fabric is shiny and obvious whereas edges of others have been matte fabric, which blends better with the fleece ear covering and is less noticeable. Also, the fabric that covers the expandable band behind the head is much too wide for the expansion band, much wider than in previous ear warmers. Overall, these are not as well designed.
customer_reviews.author: music lover

customer_reviews.title: Not real 180’s !
customer_reviews.text: Product seems ok so far but it’s nit the real 180’s brand as advertised. It just says degrees on the back.
customer_reviews.author: 4nsicSW

customer_reviews.title: They don't make them like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed. Size wise, they seem small. I don't have a large head and I have to have these all the way extended to fit. They do fit, but barely. The other issue I have is the padding for the band behind the head is lacking. You can really feel the plastic band inside. In particular, the 2 pieces that let the earmuffs slide to adjust. I have to have them 1 click larger, which in this case means fully extended so I am not feeling those 2 knobs hitting the back of my head. My old pair didn't have this problem. The fleece on the ears is soft and these do keep your ears warm, though.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hogen

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable. That's why I love this brand. They are very durable as well. Tge only reason I had to replace my last pair (of 8 years) is because my dog got ahold of them. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: They slide
customer_reviews.text: Did not like these at all. I work outside a lot and thought I might like these better than a toboggan. Not! Because they are collapsible, that’s what they do. They just want to slide off and fold up. My daughter has a pair I really like and I thought I was ordering the same thing, but they aren’t.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy the 180s brand, trust me...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this type of earmuffs for a number of years. I recently needed a new pair and found several less expensive versions on amazon. I tried a number of them. None of them seemed to have the warmth and strength of the 180s brand. The wrap around portion of most don't have much strength to hold tight to your head and stay in place. The biggest issue was they won't hold tight to your head / ears so the wind still gets in. The 180s brand solves these issues. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Average Person

customer_reviews.title: Different product from 2015
customer_reviews.text: The product is different from the one ordered in 2015. The 180s I purchased in 2015 were significantly softer in fleece material and fit perfectly around my ears, however the ones purchased on Nov. 2018 were rougher in texture and noticeable smaller in size. Wearing these caused pressure around the jaws.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Little small around the ears
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mostly because of the good reviews and I can't say I'm too happy with them. They flex well enough and are fairly warm, but they don't cover my ears completely. I've seen other reviews now that claim the company skimped out and made their product smaller so it seems like this is the reason. The quality is good but I wouldn't recommend them for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Womp Womp Womp
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I have a weird-shaped head (I don't), but I just could not get these things to fit even remotely comfortably. Sure, I could put them on, and for the most part they stayed on, but they feel so rigid that it's almost as if I'm wearing a neck brace and can't fully move my head. Technically they do work, and they were warm enough in practice, but the incredibly awkward discomfort was a dealbreaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Terry

customer_reviews.title: Fit my humongous knoggin just fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Not sure what all the complaints are about sizing. Unless they're trying to put them on top of their head. Idk I have a huge head, largest in my graduating class, they fit me just fine and they're very warm. The only reason I ordered this pair was because I lost my the first one pair in my gagage somewhere. Now I have two pair since I found the pair I lost!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth ?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I’m just not that sharp but I expected men’s Bluetooth earmuffs would have speakers in them and connect to my phone. They’re just earmuffs. They’re nice and comfortable but I could have gotten just earmuffs for less than half of the price of these. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: SafetyBobTN

customer_reviews.title: They broke after 10 days... with normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.text: I received these ear muffs on January 10th and by January 20th they were broken. At first my husband LOVED them and said they were a "game changer" for those cold Chicago walks to work. Then, without any particular reason, they broke. My husband does not have an unusually large head and he doesn't do anything strenuous in the ear muffs except walk to work in the bitter cold. They didn't even last two weeks and that is really disappointing, as this could be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DiplomatMom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking, but they do the job I guess...
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are good and would do the job for sure. They just seem a little thin and very cheap looking. I was really looking for something that had a better look to them. I can find a similar quality of earmuffs for way less money on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Low profile ear muffs that work.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only brand and style of earmuffs I will buy. They keep my ears warm in the most severe winter weather and when not in use conveniently wrap around my wrist or sit in a coat pocket. It is a balmy -25 today and dropping thanks to the wind plus snowing like mad along my part of Lake Erie yet my ears were nice and warm. What is nice about these earmuffs is they are not bulky and I wear them along with a full fleece head wrap in cold weather such as today or well out ice-fishing. I do not like coat hoods.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Fixed in Place to Keep My Ears Warm
customer_reviews.text: This product keeps my ears warm. The metal frame is stiff and not the most comfortable, and the placement on my head is weird unlike how one wears headphones. But it’s fixed in place to cover my ears. I haven’t tried it outside yet because the cold weather hasn’t hit Florida yet, but I trust the product to keep my ears warm for the cold weather because I get cold really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste time or money on these
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste time or money on these, they seem like a great item in though but don't work at all. They kept wanting to close, because they don't stay open like shown in the picture, they come curled up closed together and thats how they want to stay. They wouldnt stay on my ears, unless you didnt move your head at all- which isn't practical at all obviously. Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: OK for relatively short term use, need to reposition often, spring may be too tight for some folks.
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of Ear Mitts but lost one of the ear pieces. This seemed like a good replacement but I am not completely please with how they work. To fit properly I need to expand the connecting band and the spring pressure seems to be just a bit tight for me. Also the ear coverings tend to slide down after turning your head side-to-side and particularly up and down slightly, which requires you to reposition them often depending on how much you move your head (and this is more often than your realize). While they work OK I would not buy them again, especially if you want to use them while bicycling or other active outdoor sports.
customer_reviews.author: Techman

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, stays on while walking briskly
customer_reviews.text: I like to wear a brimmed hat, so I was looking for some muff that would go behind my head. These fit snugly and are warm down to about 12 degrees so far and aren't so tight as to make my glasses uncomfortable. When I loose these, I'd happily buy another pair. Four star; could have just a touch more padding, but a few weeks in with nearly daily use, pretty good and my ears are warm.
customer_reviews.author: CrnchyGrnla

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. Snug enough to keep ears warm and stay on the head, but relaxed enough to let earphones through. When you take them off they roll up onto themselves making it easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: EAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and exactly what I needed plus more than I ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and exactly what I needed plus more than I expected. I thought that this was a simple fixed size that folded in on itself. I received it and was surprised to learn that the connecting strap was firm but designed to be flexible with an internal slide that is also self retracting keeping pressure. So if you have a big head or small head, this is the perfect earmuff!
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: These do not arrive the way they look in the picture. It’s very misleading and they are cheaply made with plastic internal parts. They barely keep my ears warm. Don’t buy them
customer_reviews.author: Vettel

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I had seen some bad feedback, but wanted to see for myself, I assumed because they are more pricey that the quality might be better.. but they are not good quality, they really should be cheaper, from reading others feedback it seems like they used to make a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: Would love to give them 5 stars but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole idea that they are compact and can fold and be kept in you pocket, but I cant seem to get them to fit right, the back sticks out a bit. I tried to wear them upside down, and they weren't much better. They ARE better than nothing, but I really was expecting a better fit!
customer_reviews.author: M. Langenderfer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The fabric on these are very thin and of poor quality in my opinion. But worst of all, they felt like a vice grip on my ears. After wearing them a couple of times, I ended up chucking them.
customer_reviews.author: Harold A. Sessler

customer_reviews.title: Small Yet Warm
customer_reviews.text: These are both warm and nifty, well designed and as small as possible, nothing like those massive earmuffs of yesteryear. I use those inside a bicycle helmet so size and design are very important to me. When not in use, they can be folded into even the smallest of pockets. Using these earmuffs, I have been able to ride into the cold wind all the way down to about 20F degrees without any sensation of cold or discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with those with large heads
customer_reviews.text: I have a large head and hoped these would fit when I ordered them. They fit but barely and I have decided to keep them. I don't remember if they had a disclaimer that said one size fits most or not. If I had seen a disclaimer i would not have ordered them from previous experience in head gear. If it is not there it should be.
customer_reviews.author: agrandpa

customer_reviews.title: Comes in handy during Minnesota winters
customer_reviews.text: Love these earmuffs. Purchased them in 2014 and five years later still got them with me. We've had pretty brutal winters in Minnesota with subzero wind chills of -55 degrees and this product covers my ears nicely and keeps them warm.. This product is recommended, great purchase indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesús R

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have a big fat head. They fit and stay secure. Keeps your ears warm. If it were a little bigger, Id give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I already own one of these and they're nice for the cold weather. I bought a second pair just to have in my second coat's pocket. Would recommend for anybody looking for behind the head earmuffs. They're less intrusive than a beanie or a ski mask if you're trying to get to work with good hair.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Truck Driver Hubby Loves These
customer_reviews.text: Got these for hubby....he's a truck driver so out in the winter weather all the time. He swears by these things. They wrap snugly around the back of the head and cup his ears just right to keep him warm and the winter wind at bay. He can take them off and put them on really fast when necessary which is a plus since time is important as a driver. He gives these high quality 180s earmuffs two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great Ear Muffs
customer_reviews.text: I had this brand for years, but unfortunately lost my last pair. So i bought these and they have met my expectations. They are the best for keeping my ears warm. They are portable, fold up well, and fit very well. As I mentioned, they keep my ears quite warm even in cold, windy conditions and I recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.Top Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure of the fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a gift and I tried them on when they arrived. They seemed to slide back so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MissyJA

customer_reviews.title: Good, though probably not the best choice for people with freakishly big heads
customer_reviews.text: These are fine. They're warm and snugly fit my not-huge, not-small male head OK. I don't know whether they'd be comfortable wearing for hours, but they certainly do the trick for short periods. I'm happy enough that I'm buying another pair to replace the ones I lost two days after receiving them, which replaced a pair I lost two weeks before that. Maybe I should buy the pink ear warmers so I won't lose them as easily. But then people might shout, "Dress your age!" So I guess I should stick with black.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and adjust in a rush.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these are hands down impressive. I work in a warehouse where I'm constantly in and outside and standing next to open door in Minnesota so these are in and out of my pocket all day. They go on and adjust to just thr right fit in no time at all. Very comfortable too. Would recommend these to anyone looking for earmuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Picht

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my husband and they are perfect. Great price for the quality. Very soft and durable. They are also very warm. It's also super great that they do not mess up your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Alanda

customer_reviews.title: Only good if you don't have to move your head side to side.  SAD
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay on my head no matter what size I make them or which way (upside down or right side up) I wear them. I am a rural mail carrier and am constantly moving my head around, side to side and up and down. If you're just keeping your head straight, these will probably work for you. Very disappointed. I was constantly pushing them back on when the back fell down to my neck/upper back. They were warm and didn't squeeze my head though.
customer_reviews.author: 10CatMom+

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: They fit nice with the adjustment possible bu stretching them out. They are large enough and soft enough to fit over my ears with glasses frames. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: John R Bradish

customer_reviews.title: Beats cold painful ears.
customer_reviews.text: I ride bike in all seasons. Hot, cold, snow, rain, sun. It's my primary mode of transportation. Cold weather is fairly hard on me and I realy hate my ears getting cold since that causes me considerable pain. So this is my solution. They work somewhat but the fit feels a bit uncomfortable. But little uncomfortable beats severe pain. I can wear the hat of my choice with these which I found to be a big plus. I tend to wear a cowboy type hat as I redevelop a new post-military style.
customer_reviews.author: John Dye

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, a lot cheaper made than the pictures appear. I read a review that spoke about how the quality of these has gone down over the years. Decided to give it a try anyhow. The material used is very thin and cheap. Not particularly comfortable either. They do an okay job of keeping my ears warm, but just not as nice as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Smaller that my previous 180"s with lower quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this pair to replace my 180's that I had for 18 years. That is not a typo. The new version has smaller ear muffs and mechanics seems a more flimsy. They are working fine but I do not expect to get 18 years out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of earmuffs similar to these, and have been searching for a new set. These are close to what I had, but not quite. These slip down the back of my head, are kind of heard to get adjusted, but overall, they will do.
customer_reviews.author: TIM BACHICHA

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the original version
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this brand of earbands in the past and they're great, but this version barely covers my ears. It's noticeably smaller than previous versions. This would better fit my wife or even my 1 year old. I'm going to try to find a regular size, most likely a different brand. Really too bad, because I did like the 180 brand, and seeing "Amazon's Choice" made me think it was the same level of quality I expected from them.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Kersting

customer_reviews.title: Warm, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great, nothing bad to say, I wait at least a year to review anything and these have held up to multiple open and close, working on a car lot in the northeast the go on and off quite a bit and if they broke tomorrow I'd buy em again because well worth the money... oh, and they are really warm for the size!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be but still thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: As others mentioned, the new versions of these earmuffs are noticeably thinner than the old ones. That said, I still love how the 180s can fold up and take up less space. If you carry a bag, it's super handy to just wrap them around a strap when they're not in use.
customer_reviews.author: emin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is not bad. It keeps my ear warm even when the weather is below 0 Fahrenheit. However, the packaging needs extra work to be good. It looked like used when it arrived and that shaken my confidence of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Le Y. Loh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flexible earmuffs, does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: This earmuff has very good design in that it's rather flexible and folds into quite small footprint when not required. It kept on my ear although on the odd occasion it feels like it's going to come off my ear when my head is in certain angles, but not a deal breaker. Overall does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: kiwijinxter

customer_reviews.title: Way too tight!  Constant headache.
customer_reviews.text: I had tried these on in the store but saw them on Amazon for $10 less so I bought them here. I am not sure if it was the same item as the packaging was different. The quality of fleece is good as it does keep your ears warm. The reason for the low stars is the design is poor. I have a small head (men with larger heads will have more difficultly than me. It was so tight, even at the longest length, that it gave me a head ache after about 30 minutes. The product is useless to me as I can not wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it warm
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple ear muffs from them and I love them a lot. it keeps your ears warm and they fold to help with easy storage. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: countlezztimez

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Super warm, Durable, Comfortable, Great price, Great Quality. I had a pair of these for 20+ years & lost them recently which prompted a purchase of a new pair. Love my 180's . In my opinion, there's nothing on the market like them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I hate wearing a hat, I am from Canada cold and always wear these Earmuffs as soon as its a bit cold and windy all year round. They hold behind the head instead of over, so it does not mess up with my hair. They are adjustable for bigger or smaller fit around the back of the head, I don't feel them and keep warm. Long lasting, do not lint.
customer_reviews.author: Projet2907

customer_reviews.title: Warm and a great value
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is one warm ear warmer "VERY GLAD I BOUGHT IT". So comfortable I can use them with my wireless headphones LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: NICKYBONES

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: JUNK ..NOT WORTH THE MONEY...MATERIAL IS THIN ...AND THEY BARELY FIT...I DO NOT HAVE A LARHE HEAD....THEY WILL FIT A CHILD
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One size does not fit all
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a big head, or large ears. This product does not fit around my head at all , even when fully expanded, the ear pieces also do not cover my ear, I sent a message to the supplier last week and have not heard back from them ! Not happy with the product at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small and not very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I have a decently big head, but not abnormally so. This thing will not reach my ears to cover all of them. I have to hang it down around my neck to get it to reach. Also, it's a very drab dark gray, not black. The material may in fact be fleece, but it looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to headgear for Milwaukee winters. Work great and curl up small in your pocket. I've order 2-3 for myself and 1 for each of my sons. Great product
customer_reviews.author: B. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: No Hat-Hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for friend who saw them on me and tried them on. WARM, yes ! Great Quality, yes! But even better, the flexible band rests toward bottom of hairline in neck and stays put !!! No messed up hair !!!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great earmuffs!
customer_reviews.text: Quality earmuffs! Fit is good, they’re comfortable and they kept me warm during our brief, two week Winter weather cold spell. We don’t seem to be getting cold Winters anymore so I haven’t needed them as much, but they’re a solid choice if I ever need them.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a small army of behind the head earmuffs before deciding on these. Sure glad I did. My husband loves them! They fit well, are very comfortable and they fold to fit in his pocket. Much better constructed than they cheaper ones on the market. This was a good buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Good size but little hard to twist from back
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and soft. Good size. I was little fluffy from the back, it feels like hard metal like stuff at present. One i got last year was much better
customer_reviews.author: Ankush Mangla

customer_reviews.title: One size does NOT fit all
customer_reviews.text: I’m super bummed that these one-size-fits-all does not fit all. I’m not large or obese — and these still do not fit even when I extend them the entire way. Very disappointing:-(
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: Drawbacks to a Folding 180 degree ear muff
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pair of ear muffs. One that folds up nicely, and one that does not fold. The degrees 180's that folds up is ok. I find that it generally stays on my ears, but is not as snug, and at times begins to fall a bit lower on ears. This is because the ear muffs themselves are made to be pliable and fold The other ear muffs that do not fold, fit much more tighter on the ears, and are a tad warmer. You lose the benefit of the folding ear muffs, but they are snug.
customer_reviews.author: mybnj

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: They seem to fit weird on my head, maybe it is my head... But I will tell you I am glad to have them. This has been a brutal Michigan winter and they have kept my ears warm since I got them. Since I don't need to wear them constantly it is not a big deal, but if you are going to wear them for hours at a time it might bother you, also if you wear glasses as I wear sunglasses they don't work well together. A lot of adjusting to do.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Running
customer_reviews.text: These fit great. I lost my previous pair that I owned for years. They are staple for me to run with on cold days.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my son after reviewing several different types and reading reviews. My son absolutely loves these! He said they were very comfortable and keep his ears warm! He has problems with the cold causing his jaw to ache during the colder months. He said that this is all little bigger than his ears and is warn enough that so far it has stopped the jaw pain. True test will be when winter hits!! lol
customer_reviews.author: Teri Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for about a month and used them a few times. They're adjustable for the size of your head like some headphones, and the mechanism that works to fold and adjust these muffs is inside the material so it can't be seen. It seems a bit wonky or flimsy, but it may hold up - time will tell. They twist/fold inwards into a compact little bundle for storage; it's kinda cool. Since they can't just rest on top of my head, after a while they get kinda uncomfortable because they're pinching my head in order to stay on and not slip off. Not for extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: If you're like me, you hate wearing beanies and other itchy
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, you hate wearing beanies and other itchy, dopey winter hats. This allows me to wear my regular hats and keep my ears warm. Only drawback is that I lost the first pair, and had to get another. But I'll get used to that. They work well, are very warm, and are easy to use with any kind of hat
customer_reviews.author: readerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how this is Amazons best seller. Very thin, didn't work well in the cold at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: The ear covers are very small. Didn’t completely cover my ears. My ear size is about average. Over priced for what you get. Maybe I received children’s size.
customer_reviews.author: Sidro

customer_reviews.title: Just Great!
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are great! They are very practical, comfortable, light weight, and they are easily storable. They keep their purpose: keeps my ears warm and protect from both cold and wind.
customer_reviews.author: CDq

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Winter Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Best earmuffs I have ever owned. They are very lightweight and I often forget I am wearing them. I don't care for hats so this is an ideal solution to keeping my ears from stinging in cold weather (especially wind). I also really like the fact that I can wear my earbuds underneath without irritation or shifting. These are a must have for anyone traveling outside.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Warm earmuffs - tested in New England winter
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of earmuffs which does its job and still holds up well after 2 years. Like that it can be folded and fits easily into jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: PHY

customer_reviews.title: Comfy on the Ears
customer_reviews.text: Went to Chicago this past winter. (I'm from Florida so i don't often see temp highs in the 'teens for five straight days) I bought this to keep my ears warm. They worked well in doing so. They were so comfy that i forget sometimes that i have them on. Only issue i had were at times they would slip off, and at times was difficult to keep in place. Overall though, i like this and it did the job well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Flexible!
customer_reviews.text: Spending a winter in Chicago and these have been necessary to own. They easily fold up and do a great job of covering both ears. I think I have a larger head, but it adjusts well and I have no problems with sizing. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I use them to prevent my ears from freezing. I live in Iowa an it can get cold here This is the second pair I have bought and if I live long enough to need them I will buy another pay
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found this item to be somewhat ovewr rated.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I have a big head or a larger than normal neck, but I found that even when these are fully extended they didn't seem to be large enough. They continously slipped off one ear or the other. This problem was even worse when I tried to wear my hat. While to portion on the bacl of my neck wasn't affected, the ear portion came off my ears whenever I turned my head. I didn't like them and wouldn't recommend them, but my wife also got a pair (of the women's model) and they work well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Darko

customer_reviews.title: Realy protect your ears from strong winds
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for a pair I left somewhere. We have extremely strong gusts in Montana and they work like a charm. I am extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: These have been a lifesaver on many a cold winter day! They fit my head well and keep my ears warm in the wind. I usually store them around my coat sleeve when I'm not using them, and they stay on perfectly without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Fain

customer_reviews.title: Great at blocking out the wind
customer_reviews.text: These are great at blocking out the wind. They fit well and can fold up to some extent making them easy to pack. Good product and good price. My second pair. Lost the first
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: I Got the Second One
customer_reviews.text: And this type has been the Very Best that I have ever Used!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Frey

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: A must have for cold winters if you don't want to mess up your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ear muffs are good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift last year for my brother and he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Ol King Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and warm. Good quality. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, keeps my ears warm.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these 180's before and they are great products. Glad to see they have not degraded over the years, still great warmth.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: They are designed for wearing behind the head only not over the top.
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs are great! They have a plastic extender in the center of the band and I have had no trouble with it. They fit around all my thick hair and cover both ears securely without slipping as I walk and move. Very soft, quality fabric. Excellent especially for the great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A.

customer_reviews.title: Warmth and ease of use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He loves how they fit and keep his ears warm.Easy to adjust to fit around the back of the head to ears. We live in Wisconsin and the winters can be brutal!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen D. Holzman

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement for the one I lost. I am very glad to have another. The earmuff is very similar to the old one; the difference is the Degree label placement. This is a great earmuff, very comfortable and keeps the ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Milam

customer_reviews.title: Kept my Hubby's ears nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband to take with us to Italy. He absolutely was grateful for these. They came in so handy. He truly loved them. Worked great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ears warm!
customer_reviews.text: Covers ears well and keeps them warm. Love custom fit feature. Highly recommend and will purchase more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Great ear muffs that don’t mess up your hair do and hang on well during action!!
customer_reviews.text: Great got running or biking during cold months. Holds up well to sweat. Would buy again, I actually did buy a pair for father-in-law that walks daily and he loves them as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Stahl Clan

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately out of the box, metal rivet snapped ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke immediately out of the box, metal rivet snapped right in my hands. I was not being rough or forceful just trying them out at a normal pace
customer_reviews.author: vanillagorilla

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: great buy! Muffs are comfortable, adjustable, and kept my ears warm. Can't go wrong for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

product_meta.title: 180s Fleece Behind-the-Head Earmuffs
feature_bullets: Adjustable click-to-fit frames, Collapsible for easy storage
Standard fit, Wind and water resistant
